scripts.prerelease: npm --no-git-tag-version version prerelease --preid=closedbeta && node --max_old_space_size=4096 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build --configuration production --optimization=true --output-hashing=all --common-chunk=true --named-chunks=false --delete-output-path=true
scripts.buildmajor: npm --no-git-tag-version version major && node --max_old_space_size=4096 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build --configuration production --optimization=true --output-hashing=all --common-chunk=true --named-chunks=false --delete-output-path=true
scripts.buildminor: npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && node --max_old_space_size=4096 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build --configuration production --optimization=true --output-hashing=all --common-chunk=true --named-chunks=false --delete-output-path=true
scripts.buildpatch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && node --max_old_space_size=4096 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build --configuration production --optimization=true --output-hashing=all --common-chunk=true --named-chunks=false --delete-output-path=true
